helpgrid.innerhtml: Use this dialog box to import a CSV file of transaction records from an external source. You must specify a data import template. Values in the editable data fields (Site, Type, Storeroom, GL Account, and Vendor) overwrite any data in the corresponding fields in the imported data. If you select Run Import Process in Background, close Fuel Transactions Import (Tr) and then reopen it to see the imported data.

table.description: Click Select File to select the data file to import.

helpgrid.innerhtml: In the Site field, specify the site to be used in the Reconcile process. The Reconcile process adds the Site value to any transaction record that does not have a site listed. The Site value is not used for records that have a site.
